co.uk.niadel.mpi.config

Class IdConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.config.Configuration
      • co.uk.niadel.mpi.config.IdConfiguration

  • public class IdConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Used for handling numeric ids like dimension ids and, up to 1.8, block and item ids.
